name: LFG of Optimism
imagePrompt: A burst of positive energy and light, with a diverse group of Web3 avatars (small minions) cheering and growing stronger, surrounded by 'LFG!!!!!', fire emojis, and 'thank you' text bubbles.
flavorText: We're not bagholding, we're community building. There's a difference. (There isn't.)

spellEffect.description: Give all your other friendly minions +2/+2. Yell 'LFG!!!!!' for good measure.
